main event: A civilian witnessed a bright light or object moving rapidly in the southwest sky over Chicago on June 16 or 17, 1967.
interesting points: The object displayed no sound or visible form while traveling,The witness described the object as a very large, brilliantly lighted source of light,The object reversed direction multiple times without any obvious means of navigation,Another witness reported seeing a similar object approximately a month later from a different location,The observation took place at around 10:45 PM, suggesting it was at night.
sighted object: a bright light or object in the sky
